text: [[img:bullet_def_slaves]][[/img]]Slaves are vital to the Fimir, boosting their economy and granting various bonuses. When Fimir clans are destroyed or heavy losses are suffered, Death Quest units become available for recruitment. Fimir settlements are shrouded in Mist, remaining hidden to outsiders while granting bonuses to their defenders and penalties to invading armies.||[[img:bullet_nor_units]][[/img]]Fimir armies are smaller but formidable, relying on monstrous strength and heavily armoured infantry to deliver devastating shock assaults. Their ranks are supported by expendable chaff and skirmishers, while creatures from the mist instil fear and break enemy lines through brute force.

The Fimir are cyclopean, amphibious humanoid monsters that haunt bogs, fens, and desolate moorlands. Their strongholds take the form of forbidding, craggy piles of rock, crudely built in the semblance of the castles of more civilised races. Such dwellings are seldom seen by outsiders, for they are wreathed in thick mist - a miasma magically generated by the Fimir to shield their fortresses from prying eyes and themselves from the harsh glare of the sun.

Expelled to the misty coasts of the Wasteland by Graf Todbringerâ€™s forces, a maddened Skattach has proclaimed herself Hell-Mother, Queen of all Fimir, and vowed to bring about the resurgence of her race.

Having arrived in the jungles of Lustria with her zealous Fimir cultists, All-Mother Kroll plans to ascend beyond her Daemon Princess status by corrupting and harnessing the remnants of the devices of the Old Ones to become a true goddess.

From an ancient Fimir fortress in the murky swamps of Schadensumpf, Meargh Skattach rules over the Rancor Hold clan, scheming to make her ambition of bringing about the resurgence of the Fimir a reality.

Strange, eldritch creatures have always roamed the Sea of Claws, and Kroll is no exception. The Daemon Princess has set out for Norsca with her Fimir zealots to capture and absorb the Chaotic power of the land in her bid for true godhood.
